abstract: Thick layer of smog prompts Beijing authorities to issue first red alert for air pollution in 2016; cloud is expected to settle over city for five days.
lead_paragraph: The most severe notice in a four-tier system requires schools to close and half of all privately owned cars to stay off the roads.

headline.main: Beijing, Bracing for 5 Days of Heavy Pollution, Issues Red Alert
headline.print_headline: Beijing, Bracing for 5 Days of Heavy Pollution, Issues First Red Alert of the Year
